vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.16.20;
son of: Ahaz (H0271) and Abi (H0021);
brother of: Maaseiah (H4641J); married to Hephzibah (H2657);
father of: Manasseh (H4519H)
§ Hezekiah or Hizkiah or Hizkijah = "Jehovah is my strength"
1) 12th king of Judah, son of Ahaz and Abijah; a good king in that he served Jehovah and did away with idolatrous practices
2) great-great-grandfather of Zephaniah the prophet
3) son of Neariah, a descendant of David
4) head of a family of returning exiles in the time of Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) יְחִזְקִיָּהוּ ,יְחִזְקִיָּה ,חִזְקִיָּהוּ   hijo de Ahaz; rey de Judá (716/15-687/86); (b)   descendiente de Zorobabel; tribu de Judá; (c) יְחִזְקִיָּה   jefe de familia; post exílico; (d)   ancestro del profeta Sofonías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希西家 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華是我的力量"
1) 猶大國的第十二任王, 亞哈斯與亞比之子; 是服事耶和華並廢除
偶像崇拜的好君王
2) 先知西番雅的高曾祖父 (番 1:1)
3) 尼利雅之子, 大衛後裔 (代上 3:23)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
希西家 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华是我的力量"
1) 犹大国的第十二任王, 亚哈斯与亚比之子; 是服事耶和华并废除
偶像崇拜的好君王
2) 先知西番雅的高曾祖父 (番 1:1)
3) 尼利雅之子, 大卫后裔 (代上 3:23)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.23;
son of: Neariah (H5294);
brother of: Elioenai (H0454B) and Azrikam (H5840)
§ Hezekiah or Hizkiah or Hizkijah = "Jehovah is my strength"
1) 12th king of Judah, son of Ahaz and Abijah; a good king in that he served Jehovah and did away with idolatrous practices
2) great-great-grandfather of Zephaniah the prophet
3) son of Neariah, a descendant of David
4) head of a family of returning exiles in the time of Nehemiah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.16;
son of: Ater (H0333)
Also named: ye.chiz.qiy.yah (יְחִזְקִיָּה "Hezekiah" H3169I)
§ Hezekiah or Hizkiah or Hizkijah = "Jehovah is my strength"
1) 12th king of Judah, son of Ahaz and Abijah; a good king in that he served Jehovah and did away with idolatrous practices
2) great-great-grandfather of Zephaniah the prophet
3) son of Neariah, a descendant of David
4) head of a family of returning exiles in the time of Nehemiah

4) head of a family of returning exiles in the time of Nehemiah
